description:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.
This set contains the following:

Playable Aircraft: F-2A -Super Kai-
A modernized multirole support fighter based on the F-2.
It retains the F-2's excellent strength in interdictions at sea, but has been improved to handle both aerial and anti-surface combat, making it great for a variety of mission types.
This set also includes 7 skins, including the special Tiger Skin.

This aircraft can equip the LASM, 6AAM, or IEWS as its special weapon.
name: ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - F-2A -Super Kai- Set
